title: Nanostructural diversity: self-assembly of isomeric pyrene–cholane amphiphiles into sheets, tubes, and worm-like morphologies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31498-31501
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06420H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Edouard Ehret, Ioan Iacovache, Simon M. Langenegger, Benoît Zuber, Robert Häner
The supramolecular self-assembly of isomeric cholane–pyrene–cholane oligomers into different morphologies is described along as their spectroscopic properties.
